channel.title: Software on ...Down the Rabbit Hole...
channel.description: Recent content in Software on ...Down the Rabbit Hole...

item.title: Resources for getting started in a world of open-source software
item.description: This is a list of resources that I’ve found useful to combine as a handout for students (from teaching a range of different courses). You can download the list in pdf form here if you like printing documents to read later. I’m currently in the process of adding this material as an online post, so check back often!
